general.title: GENERAL INTRODUCTION
general.content:
Thien Loc Sheet Metal Production and Fabrication Company was established in January 2026, operating in the field of production, processing and supplying sheet metal products for many different industries. The company specializes in processing sheet metal according to requirements with items such as laser cutting, CNC cutting, bending, punching, welding, assembly and surface finishing. Besides, Thien Loc also operates in the fields of design - manufacturing of mechanical parts, production of metal frames, electrical cabinets, cable trays, metal railings - fences, light steel structures and auxiliary mechanical products for industry and construction.

With the orientation of taking quality, progress and prestige as the core values, the company constantly invests in modern machinery systems, improves production processes and enhances the skills of the technical team. The company's headquarters and production workshop are located in Vong La village, Thien Loc commune, convenient for production, transportation and cooperation with partners in and out of the region. Thien Loc aims to become a reliable sheet metal processing unit, accompanying customers and partners for a long time on the path of sustainable development

profile.title: CAPABILITY PROFILE
profile.subtitle: THIEN LOC SHEET METAL PRODUCTION AND FABRICATION COMPANY

info.title: 1. General information
items: Company name: Thien Loc Sheet Metal Production and Fabrication Company
Address: Vong La village, Thien Loc commune
Field of activity: Sheet metal production and fabrication

fields.title: 2. Main fields of activity
fields.description: Thien Loc operates intensively in the field of sheet metal production and fabrication, including:
items: Design and manufacturing of mechanical parts
Production of metal frames, electrical cabinets, cable trays
Processing of railings, fences, light steel structures and auxiliary mechanical products for industry and construction

capacity.title: 3. Production capacity
capacity.content: The company owns a modern system of sheet metal processing machinery and equipment, well meeting the technical requirements and progress of customers. The technical team and workers are skilled, rich in practical experience, ready to advise and implement processing solutions suitable for each specific need.

quality.title: 4. Quality commitment
quality.content: Thien Loc always puts product quality - delivery progress - cooperative reputation first. Each product before handover is carefully inspected, ensuring it matches the drawings, technical requirements and achieves high aesthetic value.

development.title: 5. Development orientation
development.content: With the goal of sustainable development, Thien Loc constantly invests in upgrading machinery, improving production processes and enhancing service quality, aiming to become a reputable sheet metal processing unit, a reliable partner of customers inside and outside the region.

facilities.title: FACILITIES
facilities.intro: Sheet Metal Production & FABRICATION Co., Ltd always focuses on investing and perfecting the facility system to build a professional and modern working environment, creating conditions for the staff and employees to maximize their capacity and enthusiastic working spirit. Thanh Tien is not only a convergence of high-quality human resources but also an environment for each individual to develop, dedicate and accompany the business for a long time.

section_a.title: A. Production Workshop
section_a.p1: Currently, Thanh Tien owns a large-scale factory system, scientifically arranged, fully meeting production and processing requirements according to high quality standards.
section_a.p2: Production areas are arranged separately for each stage, from receiving raw materials, processing, assembly to product finishing. Each stage is supported by a system of modern machinery, equipment and auxiliary means, helping to optimize performance and ensure high precision.
section_a.p3: Besides, professional departments conduct strict inspection and supervision after each production stage, to ensure that the products when leaving the factory always achieve the best quality according to the requirements of customers. Industrial hygiene, occupational safety and fire prevention and fighting systems are fully equipped, strictly complying with current regulations, contributing to protecting the health and safety of workers.

section_b.title: B. Working Office
section_b.content: Thanh Tien's office system is built spaciously with a total floor area of over 700m¬≤, fully equipped with office equipment, accessories and technical equipment for profession. The working space is scientifically and modernly arranged, well meeting the working needs of departments and creating a professional and effective working environment.
section_b.address_value: New Cultural House, Vong La Village, Thien Loc Commune, Hanoi City

partners.title: PARTNERS
partners.intro: Thien Loc Sheet Metal Production and Fabrication Company always values building and developing sustainable cooperative relationships with partners, suppliers and customers in the spirit of prestige ‚Äì transparency ‚Äì mutual development.
partners.fields: The company is currently cooperating with many partners in the fields of mechanical engineering, construction, auxiliary industry and equipment production, contributing to creating a stable and effective supply chain.
partners.collaboration: Through the cooperation process, Thien Loc constantly improves production capacity, improves product quality and optimizes technical solutions to better meet the increasing requirements of partners.
partners.motto: With the motto of long-term cooperation, respecting commitments and harmonizing benefits, Thien Loc aims to become a reliable partner, accompanying customers and partners in current and future projects.

privacy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.p1: Thien Loc Sheet Metal Production and Fabrication Company is committed to absolute confidentiality of all personal information of customers and partners when accessing, contacting and cooperating through the website. This privacy policy is built to clearly show Thien Loc's responsibility in respecting privacy and protecting customers' personal data.
privacy.p2: All collected information is only used for internal purposes, serving consulting, quoting and service implementation. We do not sell, exchange or share customers' personal information to any third party without customer consent, except for cases prescribed by law.

collection.title: PERSONAL INFORMATION COLLECTION
collection.intro: Thien Loc collects personal identification information when customers actively provide it, including but not limited to: full name, phone number, email address, contact address and information related to service needs.
collection.extra: In addition, during the process of customers accessing the website, we may collect some technical information such as:
list: Source of access to the website
collection.footer: This information is collected for the purpose of enhancing user experience, improving service quality and managing/operating the website more effectively.

usage.title: PURPOSE OF INFORMATION USE
usage.intro: Customers' personal information is used by Thien Loc for the following purposes:
list: Contacting for consulting, answering customer requests
Providing quotes, service information and technical support
Implementing contracts, orders and related obligations
Improving service quality and user experience
usage.footer: We commit to only use information correctly with stated purposes and within the necessary scope.

sharing.title: INFORMATION DISTRIBUTION AND SHARING
sharing.intro: Thien Loc does not share customers' personal information with outside organizations or individuals, except for the following cases:
sharing.consent_body: We only share personal information when we receive explicit approval from the customer.
sharing.legal_body: In case of requirements from competent state agencies or for investigation/fraud prevention purposes according to law, Thien Loc may provide information in accordance with current regulations.

security.title: INFORMATION SECURITY
security.content: Thien Loc applies appropriate management and technical measures to protect customers' personal information from risks of unauthorized access, loss, leakage or misuse. Only authorized individuals and departments are allowed to access information within their assigned work scope.

contact.title: QUESTIONS AND CONTACT
contact.intro: If you have any questions, concerns or comments related to the privacy policy, please contact us through the following channels:
contact.footer: We are always ready to receive and answer all feedback from customers.

changes.title: POLICY CHANGES
changes.content: Thien Loc has the right to update and adjust the content of this privacy policy when necessary to suit business activities and current legal regulations. All changes will be publicly announced on the website.

time.title: APPLICATION TIME
time.content: This privacy policy is effective and applied throughout the time the website of Thien Loc Sheet Metal Production and Fabrication Company is operating.

about.title: High Quality Sheet Metal Processing
about.description: Explore professional sheet metal production and processing solutions at Thien Loc.
about.content: From cutting ‚Äì punching ‚Äì bending ‚Äì welding ‚Äì powder coating to assembly, we provide precise, durable products tailored to every industry's requirements.
about.paragraph1: THIEN LOC SHEET METAL PRODUCTION AND FABRICATION COMPANY LIMITED is a leading unit in the field of sheet metal production and fabrication in Vietnam.
about.paragraph2: With more than 10 years of experience and a team of highly skilled technicians, we are committed to providing quality, precise, and sustainable products, meeting the strict standards of industrial sectors.
about.paragraph3: From cutting, punching, bending, welding, powder coating to final assembly, each Thien Loc product is meticulously processed on modern production lines, ensuring high precision and outstanding aesthetics.
about.paragraph4: We constantly innovate technology and improve service quality to provide the most optimal and effective solutions for all customers and partners.
